title: Rehabilitation, Upgrading  and Modernization of Small and Medium Industrial Estates
decision_details: there are 265 small and medium industrial firms engaged in manufacturing in the 18 Industrial Estates and these establishments provide direct employment to over 6,900 persons.  The project components include the renovation of internal road networks, peripheral security fencing, water supply and sewerage improvements, internal street lighting, fire protection systems and worker welfare facilities.  The proposal made by Hon. Douglas Devananda, Minister of Traditional Industries and Small Enterprise Development, to proceed with the project at a total cost of Rs.305.5 million, with funds to be provided from 2013 to 2015, was approved by the Cabinet.
